task.summary: changed interaction with the download manager
changed adapter for pageview for filters
Added a screen in the list of chapters for quick action with chapters and added a setting for displaying screen titles.
Only those filters are displayed where there are more than one elements.
updated logic of loading image, added button for update image
"error" and "pause" download merged to "pause", update their dependencies
add button for full clean manga`s folder
fix problems after hide application and return: showing statusbar broken orientation broken progress of reading
fix problem with db in first run app after installation
changing the way a manga is received
changing the way a logo is received
add support android 10 use daynight theme update colors update icons fix ui
refactoring move task "update manga for new category name" to WorkManager replace livedata with kotlin flow
refactoring remove activity main reorganized first launch initialization
